name: Youchien Gaiden: Karei naru Casino Club: Double Draw
overview: Youchien Gaiden Kareinaru Casino Club - Double Draw is a gambling game that features Roulette, Baccarat, Blackjack, Gunshooting, Racing, etc. The game features 3 game modes: - Lesson Mode: Sort of a practice mode. - Story Mode: The player takes the role of a gambler that arrives at casino town and goes to Casino Blind Luck (that is a casino in the Blind Luck Hotel). - Party Mode: A mode to play against other human players or computer opponents all the mini games of the game.
